summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the execution of an amendment to a grant agreement with the Seattle Housing Authority (SHA) to accept an additional $15,000 grant to support a summer playground program at the Yesler Terrace Community Center; increasing the expenditure authority in the Department's 1998 Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Parks and Recreation Fund therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
